title: Buttermilk Pancakes
story:
I have several pancakes recipes that I like, the recint one - buttermilk pancakes.

Perfect with some sourcream and hot chocolate drink, or with fresh berries and maple syrup.

ingredients.preparationNotes: maple syrup, berries, sour cream to serve with

instructions: Dissolve baking soda in some of buttemilk, leave for a moment aside.
In one bowl mix flour, baking powder, salt, sugar.
In another bowl all wet ingredients: ligthly beaten egg yolk, buttermilk, melted butter and buttermilk and soda mixture.
Make a well in the dry ingredients and pour wet ingridients into it.
Mix everything very well. Set aside for 10 or so minutes.
Meanwhile whisk egg whites till soft peaks.
Start incorporating egg whites into the batter.

On a medium heat in a pan lightly greased with canola oil start frying pancakes. You can make any sizes and shapes you like. I do 1.5 tablespoons of batter per pancake. Makes ~10 pancakes from this amount of ingredients.
Enjoy with fresh berries, maple syrup or sour cream.
